about_the_game:
The Art of Growbot

The art book of Growbot features 30 pages full of drawings, sketches, drafts and ideas that laid the foundations for the art of Growbot. In the book you will find details of the journey we took to find our artistic direction and the decision making process we went through.

Take a deeper insight into art design of Growbot.

The package also contains a Story Walkthrough counting 33 pages.

Both documents are in english.

The books contain both plot and puzzle-related spoilers. In order to enjoy the game to the fullest, we highly recommend you read through the books AFTER playing the game!

To access the books from Steam: select 'Growbot' -> right click -> 'Manage' -> 'Browse local files'. You will find "Growbot_Art_Book.pdf" and "Growbot_Playthrough" in the folder.
